'''''Minecraft: Chinese Mythology (Original Soundtrack)''''' is the third soundtrack for ''Minecraft'' released by [[Gareth Coker]], which contains music from the [[Resource Pack/Mash-up pack#Chinese Mythology Edition|Chinese Mythology mash-up pack]]. Originally released as part of the October 4, 2016 update to Legacy Console Edition, the soundtrack was later released on December 21, 2016.
